context: Tell me what kind of movies would you like to watch?
I like action, comedy, and click flicks.
Have you seen The Texas Chain Saw Massacre (1974) ? it is a horror movie
No! and No! Not my kind of movie at all!
What about American Pie (1999) and Scary Movie (2000) ?
You can also try You Don't Mess with the Zohan (2008) and Click (2010) by Adan Sandler
entity: You Don't Mess with the Zohan (2008)
resp: And if you like old movies you can also watch The Mask (1994) by Jean Carrey
